communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arizona Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

This request is a clone of P014768-030424; please reinvoice me for immediate payments

Please provide records sufficient to show a current staff roster of all sworn employees with your agency.

Please include;
- first and last name of each employee with their corresponding;
- badge number
- employee identification number
- hire date
- rank or position
- assigned duty station/substation/precinct/location
- current salary

This request applies to ALL sworn Department employees, including those at substations.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Marcus Boyd

title: Kent School District - Lawsuits filed against Kent School District 2023-2024

communications.subject: Washington Public Records Act Request: Kent School District - Lawsuits filed against Kent School District 2023-2024
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Washington Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. I request complete copies of all records and writings regarding all lawsuits filed in any jurisdiction against Kent School District in the years 2023 - 2024. Please provide copies of the lawsuits and exhibits themselves as well as any records and writings referencing the lawsuits including communications, responses, etc.

Washington Superior Court Lawsuits filed against Kent School District in 2023 and 2024 include but are not limited to: 

24-2-07650-6 KNT	04/08/2024	RILEY VS KENT SCHOOL DISTRICT
24-2-07004-4 KNT	03/29/2024	COOK VS KENT SCHOOL DISTRICT
24-2-06877-5 KNT	03/29/2024	NELSON VS KENT SCHOOL DISTRICT
23-2-24933-0 KNT	12/15/2023	YOUNG ET ANO VS KENT SCHOOL DISTRICT
23-2-23051-5 KNT	11/21/2023	KIRKES VS KENT SCHOOL DISTRICT
23-2-10155-3 SEA	06/05/2023	HERNANDEZ-MARTINEZ VS KENT SCHOOL DISTRICT
23-2-10074-3 SEA	06/02/2023	HERNANDEZ-MARTINEZ ET ANO VS KENT SCHOOL DISTRICT
23-2-02076-6 KNT	02/02/2023	PRECISION UNDERGROUND UTILITIES VS CHRISTENSEN INC ET AL
23-2-00316-1 KNT	01/06/2023	B A VS KENT SCHOOL DISTRICT

Please produce all records installments in reverse chronological order, or most recent files first.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

executivesession

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: National Guard support for 2011 film "Contagion"
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any documents pertaining to collaboration between the US National Guard and the production of the 2011 movie "Contagion," directed by Steven Soderbergh and starring Matt Damon and Kate Winslet. I request any and all documents pertaining to National Guard involvement with "Contagion" Such documents may include but should not be limited to: script notes; production assistance agreements; and all records of communications between employees of the National Guard and the cast, crew, and production company of "Contag," including memos, notes of meetings and conference calls, emails, and other forms of communication.

"Contagion" appears on a list of National Guard-supported film and TV productions (attached to this request).

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply. Attached is a document with organization letterhead confirming my position, as well as the organization's 501(c)(3) application and approval form.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo

title: National Guard support for 2011 film "Battle Los Angeles"

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: National Guard support for 2011 film "Battle Los Angeles"
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any documents pertaining to collaboration between the US National Guard and the production of the 2011 movie "Battle Los Angeles," directed by Jonathan Liebesman and starring Aaron Eckhart. I request any and all documents pertaining to National Guard involvement with "Battle Los Angeles." Such documents may include but should not be limited to: script notes; production assistance agreements; and all records of communications between employees of the National Guard and the cast, crew, and production company of "Battle Los Angeles," including memos, notes of meetings and conference calls, emails, and other forms of communication.

"Battle Los Angeles" appears on a list of National Guard-supported film and TV productions (attached to this request) as "Battle LA."

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply. Attached is a document with organization letterhead confirming my position, as well as the organization's 501(c)(3) application and approval form.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo
